price: Mehwehwε ntwitwagyeε firi me Wura ne mo Wura Nyankopͻn no hͻ sε monsi me aboͻ nku me.
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
